column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Quantity / Prices: First off
column2: the service here was pretty nice and fast
column3: so hats off to Jinya for that. Now
column5: the portion size compared to the price of the dish can be a little harsh. And in this case
column7: the cost of the bowl of Ramen is pretty expensive compared to it's ingredients
column9: and work put into making it.
